questions.question: According to Mr Vyas, what was the objective of the raids?
options: ~Creating unrest and a lack of confidence

questions.question: Jai Narayan Vyas questions that the entire process was a
JaiVeer Shergill states that the Congress is embroiled in a case of vendetta because
options: ~The objective of the IT raid was not the seize money
~The intent was to seize and snatch Congress MLAs
~The raid was not on an individual, but on democracy and fair and free elections

questions.question: JaiVeer Shergill emphasises that the raids only highlight BJP’s
options: ~pattern laid out by the Panama papers
=Political desperation to gain strength in Rajya Sabha

questions.question: Mr Vyas states that the point of the raids is moot because
options: ~There is no case of the Congress MLAs being threatened or of being witch-hunted
~The complaint to the Election Commission was wrong
=The Finance Minister has amply clarified the position and purpose of the IT department
~There is no tangible proof in the form of reports, of the wild charges being made

questions.question: Mr Vyas alleges that all the charges being laid at the door of the BJP are
Mr Shergill accuses that
options: ~Congress MLAs are being hounded to gain strength in Rajya Sabha
~Bribes are being offered to Congress MLAs to join BJP
~Police forces are behaving like the muscle men of BJP
